ref: 8848 prasūna ʻ born ʼ lex., n. ʻ flower ʼ MBh., ˚aka -- n. lex. [As ʻ flower ʼ poss. < praśūna -- ʻ swollen ʼ Suśr. (semant. cf. phulla -- ), but cf. Pk. pasūa -- n. ʻ flower ʼ < prasūta<-> n. ʻ id. ʼ lex. ~ prasava -- m. (n.) ʻ id. ʼ MBh., prasūti -- f. ʻ coming forth (of flowers) ʼ Kālid. which do not, however, rule out possibility of collision in all these words of √śvi with √sū]
